text: Escape is the seventh studio album by the American rock band Journey. The album was released on July 31, 1981. It was the group's fourth studio album with vocalist Steve Perry. ==Track listing== #Don't Stop Believin' #Stone in Love #Who's Crying Now #Keep On Runnin' #Still They Ride #Escape #Lay It Down #Dead or Alive #Mother, Father #Open Arms Category:1981 albums Category:Journey (band) albums
title: Escape (Journey album)
